meanings.sent1: I enlink the puzzle pieces to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The bridge enlinks the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent3: Trying to enlink socks with sandals is a fashion faux pas.
meanings.sent4: Music has the power to enlink people from different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The magician enlinked the rings in a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: To establish a link or connection between two things.
meanings.sent1: I enlink the website to the online store for easy access.
meanings.sent2: The Wi-Fi router enlinks all our devices to the internet.
meanings.sent3: The detective enlinked the suspect to the crime scene using evidence.
meanings.sent4: Her smile enlinked her to the memory of a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The thread enlinks the beads into a beautiful necklace.

meanings.definition: To unite or bond in a close relationship.
meanings.sent2: Shared experiences enlink friends for life.
meanings.sent3: The secret handshake enlinks members of the club.
meanings.sent4: Laughter can enlink people in moments of joy.
meanings.sent5: Kindness has the power to enlink hearts and souls.
